2 granny squares joined together you can use whichever method you prefer to join the squares together **us terms** materials  hook 5mm  yarn i ve used paintbox dk aran but you can use cotton aran of any brand if you prefer  tapestry needle  scissors abbreviations  mc magic_ring  chain chain  slip_stitch slip_stitch  single_crochet single_crochet  double_crochet double_crochet  treble_crochet treble_crochet let s begin… round 1 using your first colour make a magic_ring if you prefer you can chain 5 sl st into first chain and close to form a loop chain 3 this will count as your first double_crochet you then want to make 15 double_crochet into the loop join to the top of the 1st st & fasten_off 16st *a little tip for my ends i like to weave them in as i work so that there s less to weave in when i get to the end * round 2 puff stitches attach second colour & chain 2 to do a puff *yarn over insert hook into same st as chain 2 and pull up a loop to the height of a double_crochet 3 loops on hook repeat the same twice more so that you have 7 loops altogether on your hook pull through all 7 loops chain 1 to lock the st * repeat all the way around until you have 16 puff stitches join to the top of chain 2 slip_stitch & fasten_off 16st round 3 cluster stitches attach third colour in the spaces between the puff stitches & chain 3 cluster stitch *yarn over insert hook in between 2 puff stitches and pull up a loop yarn over & pull through 2 loops only this leaves 2 loops on the hook make 3 more incomplete double_crochet there are now 5 stitches on your hook pull through all 5 & chain 2 to lock stitches repeat in every space around until you have 16 cluster stitches join to the top of the chain 3 slip_stitch & fasten_off 16st in this next round we will be turning our circle into a square we will be working with different heights of stitches to achieve this with this type of granny square we won t be chaining 1 between each cluster round 4 attach fourth colour in any space from the previous round chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet 2dc in the same space *in the next space work all of the following 3tr chain
